doc:
David Baddiel https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/David_Baddiel 0 David Lionel Baddiel (; born 28 May 1964) is an English comedian, novelist and television presenter. He is known for his work alongside Rob Newman in The Mary Whitehouse Experience and partnership with Frank Skinner. Besides comedy, Baddiel is also a published novelist and a screenwriter who is the author of the children's novels The Parent Agency, The Person Controller, AniMalcolm and Birthday Boy. David_Lionel_Baddiel ( ; born_28_May_1964 ) is an_English_comedian_,_novelist_and_television_presenter . Besides comedy , Baddiel is also a_published_novelist and a_screenwriter who is the_author of the_children 's_novels The_Parent_Agency , The_Person_Controller , AniMalcolm and Birthday_Boy .
